[timestamp: 2025-07-21T10:48:41.211Z]

Hello! I've retrieved your current knowledge base context.

You're currently discussing the Power-of-Attorney document from `test_document.pdf`, specifically sections related to clarifications and amendments of the Expression of Interest (EOI) proposals, as well as stage 3 - Process and Stages of EOI.

Here are some key points extracted from your knowledge base:

1. Punjab Information Technology Board (PITB) may ask participating companies for clarifications on their proposals within 2 working days.
2. PITB reserves the right to modify the EOI proposals at any time, with amendments clearly outlined and requiring participating firms/companies to amend their proposals accordingly.

You've also mentioned a specific requirement related to:

3. Not providing any money or thing of value, either directly or indirectly, for special consideration in the process of Expression of Interest, or for giving undue advantage to any participating firm/company.

If you'd like to add more context, ask questions, or explore related topics further, feel free to let me know!
